text:
SQL’s awfulness leads developers to avoid implementing things relationally, when most of most business apps can be expressed in FOL.

This sort of thing (SurrealDB is another one) should be at the heart of what folks here are all about: if we can reduce the need to code in a TC language, that would be a better Future of Coding.
